ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:21:59 [Issue ID 4000-461029] urn:comicvine:4000-461029 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 12:46:21. [Issue ID 1245390]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Inspired by Tales From the Crypt, Twilight Zone, and Creep Show, Zenescope goes back to its roots of horror as the publisher known for re-inventing classics delves into an entirely new bag of tricks. From Poe to Lovecraft to brand new Fables, these tales of terror are sure to creep you out in a whole new way!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Richard Ortiz & Alessia Nocera | 1 | B | Cover B | Steven Cummings & Stephen Schaffer | 3 | C | Cover C | Wes Huffor & Ylenia Di Napoli | 4 | D | Cover D | Drew Edward Johnson | 5 | RI | Red Carpet Retailer Incentive Cover | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | Missing | RE | Red Carpet Exclusive Cover, Limited to 100 | Michael Dooney & Ula Mos | Missing | RE | Boston Comic Con Exclusive Cover, Limited to 250 | Elias Chatzoudis | 2 | RE | Secret Exclusive Cover | Eric J & Stephen Schaffer | Missing |
